ABOUT THE GAME

Welcome To The Most Chaotic Day Job in VR!

With a variety of stockable products, endless ways to customize your store, and customers who react to you in real time, you have everything you need to become the ultimate supermarket manager!

{"height":400,"type":"video","width":1280}

Your Store, Your Way: Freely arrange your displays, stock a variety of products, and customize your store to your liking.
